question: Assalam alaikum wa rahmatullah Is shaving head and mustaches is Sunnath? JazakAllah wa khairum -Muneer
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (SAW) shaved his hair only once during Haj. It is therefore
permissible to do so. Hadhrath Ali (RA) used to shave his hair often.

Rasulullah (SAW) advised to shorten the moustache.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
